thread.section_title: Bandzoogle Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bandzoogle | bandzoogle.com
thread.title: Mentum

author: Mentum
title: Mentum
text: I have been programming and managing client websites for over 20 years and by far, Bandzoogle has one of the easiest and sexiest platforms to use, as well as (and this is even more important) THE best support system for finding answers to issues or problems I've ever experienced. The folks there know there stuff and are available all the time. You even get a video explanation of solutions - nice since I learn better visually. I hesitated posting this because if this company really catches on, I can't see that top notch level of support staying at such a high level. Until then, It's the hidden gem in the web developers world.
